author: evenisse
msg: Fix Maven-343. Support large jar files. Thanks to James Macgill.

author: vmassol
msg: Make the core independent of the repo layout. Thanks to dIon. Actually, I never used the Artifact object. I'll need to check its source code as it looks good.

author: vmassol
msg: Now using pom.artifacts to support <jar> override

author: vmassol
msg: Add all user jars that have been marked to be included in the cactus
in dependencies). For example, DBUnit would be a jar you would
include in a Cactus test but not in a runtime war.

author: michal
msg: Artifact processing in the plugin was slightly changed and now it supports jar overriding mechanism
